prompt: Create a 7-day Python learning plan focusing on Asyncio and Pydantic. Search for resources if needed. Save it as 'Python_Plan.md' in the 'General' folder. Report the document ID.
gold_response: Searched for Python learning resources, created a 7-day plan covering Asyncio (Days 1-3) and Pydantic (Days 4-7). Saved as 'Python_Plan.md' (docID: doc008) in the General folder.

rubric.criteria: The agent must search for Python learning resources or Asyncio/Pydantic tutorials.
The agent must create a document named 'Python_Plan.md' in the 'General' folder.
The document content must be a 7-day plan covering both Asyncio and Pydantic.
The agent must report the ID of the created document.
